titleStmt.title: The doting Athenians imposing questions, no proofs. In answer to their questions and most apparent mistakes, about the people commonly called Quakers and their profession. This being our 5th. answer to their Mercuries of the 7th. 11th. and 14th. of June last.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Thomas Northcott in George-yard in Lombard-Street,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: torn with some loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
